columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_XID
columns.description: The XID for the packaged item.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Packaged item free form text field for the description. For example, a case of soda.

columns.name: ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item. Product without the packaging.

columns.name: HAZMAT_PACKAGE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the hazmat package type. This field can be used to give the packaged item a special description. If you are defining a hazardous material, use this field to describe it.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaging unit.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SHIP_UNIT_WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the ship unit.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SHIP_UNIT_WEIGHT_UOM
columns.description: The weight unit of measure related to the  packaged ship unit weight.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SHIP_UNIT_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit weight in base units.

columns.name: INNER_PACK_COUNT
columns.description: The count for the number of items in the inner pack.

columns.name: INNER_PACK_PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The packaging unit related to the count for the number of items in the inner pack.

columns.name: INNER_PACK_SIZE
columns.description: Indicates the inner pack count or size. The inner pack size unit of measure qualified the value entered here.

columns.name: INNER_PACK_SIZE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the pack size entry. Packaged item = case of soda - inner pack = six pack inner pack size = 4, inner pack unit of measure = six pack.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_VOLUME
columns.description: Packaged ship unit volume.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Package ship unit volume unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_LENGTH
columns.description: Package ship unit ship unit length.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Package ship unit length unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit ship unit length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_WIDTH
columns.description: Packaged ship unit width.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Package ship unit width unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_HEIGHT
columns.description: Package ship unit ship unit height.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Package ship unit height unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit ship unit height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: IS_DEFAULT_PACKAGING
columns.description: Check box indicating if the information entered is the default packaging for this item.

columns.name: IS_HAZARDOUS
columns.description: Check box indicating if the information entered is the packaged item is considered hazardous.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, this defines the diameter of the core.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, unit of measure for the diameter of the core.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the base value of the diameter of the core.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_DIAMETER
columns.description: Packaged ship unit diameter.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Package ship unit diameter unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGE_SU_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: Package ship unit diameter in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: BB_HANDLING_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates the Batch Balancer handling type for the packaged item. Valid handling types are conveyable, non-conveyable, and repack. Batch Balancer logic uses this info to determine potential batches for order release line assignment in the event an order release needs to be split across multiple batches.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Type of packaged item.

columns.name: LOAD_CONFIG_RULE_RANK
columns.description: During 3D loading of mixed items, the packaged item with the highest rank will be used to find the matching stackability rule and load config rule.

columns.name: THU_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: Defines all valid THUs the PI can be packed into.

columns.name: PARCEL_PACKTYPE
columns.description: Parcel package type.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE1
columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data Type VARCHAR2 (150)

columns.name: IS_ALLOW_MIXED_FREIGHT
columns.description: Allow mixed freight should be selected if the packaged item can be packed into a ship unit with other mixable packaged items.

columns.name: BULK_MIXING_FAMILY_GID
columns.description: Indicates the bulk mixing family the packaged item belongs to.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_TYPE_PROF_GID
columns.description: Compartment type profile attached to the packaged item.

columns.name: CATEGORY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaged item category.

columns.name: PRIORITY
columns.description: This column defines the priority associated with an packaged item.

columns.name: IS_NESTABLE
columns.description: Specifies if the packaged item is nestable or not

columns.name: INCR_NESTING_HEIGHT
columns.description: Specifies the incremental nesting height for the PI
